property.name: dcs.master.port
property.description: Default port for clients to connect to Trafodion.

property.name: dcs.master.info.port
property.description: The port for the DCS Master web UI. Set to -1 if you do not want a User Interface instance run.

property.name: dcs.master.floating.ip
property.description: Provides failover to DCS Backup servers (requires floating IP address)

property.name: dcs.master.floating.ip.external.ip.address
property.display-name: DCS High Availability - Floating IP address
property.description: Provides failover to DCS Backup servers

property.name: dcs.dns.interface
property.description: The server uses the local host name for reporting its IP address. If your machine has multiple interfaces the server will use the interface that the primary host name resolves to. If this is insufficient, you can set this property to indicate the primary interface e.g., "eth1". This only works if your cluster configuration is consistent and every host has the same network interface configuration.

property.name: dcs.master.floating.ip.external.interface
property.display-name: Network interface for floating IP address
property.description: The server uses the local host name for reporting its IP address. If your machine has multiple interfaces the server will use the interface that the primary host name resolves to. If this is insufficient, you can set this property to indicate the primary interface e.g., "eth1". This only works if your cluster configuration is consistent and every host has the same network interface configuration.

property.name: dcs.server.user.program.statistics.interval.time
property.description: Time in seconds on how often the aggregation data should be published. Setting this value to '0' will revert to default. Setting this value to '-1' will disable publishing aggregation data.

property.name: dcs.server.user.program.statistics.limit.time
property.description: Time in seconds for how long the query has been executing before publishing statistics to metric_query_table. To publish all queries set this value to '0'. Setting this value to '-1' will disable publishing any data to metric_query_table. The default is 60. Warning - Setting this value to 0 will cause query performance to degrade

property.name: dcs.info.threads.max
property.description: The maximum number of threads of the info server thread pool. Threads in the pool are reused to process requests. This controls the maximum number of requests processed concurrently. It may help to control the memory used by the info server to avoid out of memory issues. If the thread pool is full, incoming requests will be queued up and wait for some free threads.

property.name: dcs.info.threads.min
property.description: The minimum number of threads of the info server thread pool. The thread pool always has at least these number of threads so the info server is ready to serve incoming requests.

property.name: dcs.server.handler.threads.max
property.description: For every DcsServer specified in the conf/servers file the maximum number of server handler threads that will be created. There can never be more than this value for any given DcsServer.

property.name: zookeeper.session.timeout
property.description: The server passes this to the ZooKeeper quorum as suggested maximum time for a session (This setting becomes ZooKeeper's 'maxSessionTimeout'). See http://hadoop.apache.org/ZooKeeper/docs/current/ZooKeeperProgrammers.html#ch_zkSessions "The client sends a requested timeout, the server responds with the timeout that it can give the client. " In milliseconds.

property.name: zookeeper.znode.parent
property.description: All of dcs's ZooKeeper znodes that are configured with a relative path will go under this node. By default, all of dcs's ZooKeeper file path are configured with a relative path, so they will all go under this directory unless changed.

property.name: dcs.zookeeper.quorum
property.description: Comma separated list of servers in the ZooKeeper Quorum. For example, "host1.mydomain.com,host2.mydomain.com,host3.mydomain.com".

property.name: dcs.zookeeper.property.clientPort
property.description: The port at which ZooKeeper is listening for clients.
